feeds.label: I'd like to be informed by CedCommerce about:

fields.jet_fullfillmentnode:
Fulfillment Node Id text 5 1 sudo 0 0 required-entry
1

sandbox.label: Sandbox mode
sandbox.comment: Choose Yes to set the Integration in Test Enviroment. Choose No to set the Integration in production enviroment.

debug.label: Debug mode
debug.comment: Choose Yes to Start Jet Integration in debug mode. It will capture log for the debug process.

jet_default_payment.label: Choose Default Payment Method for Jet Orders

jet_order_prefix.label: Order Prefix for Jet Orders
jet_order_prefix.comment: Odrer Prefix for Jet Order Id.Example: For JET_10001 Use : JET_ , for JET-10001 use : JET-

jet_admin_email_id.label: Store Admin Email Id
jet_admin_email_id.comment: Get Email When New Jet Order Imported.Example: owner@example.com

auto.label: Enable Automated Shipment
auto.comment: Automated Shipment is supported for shipstation and shipworks only .

jetre_active.label: Global Repricing Enable
jetre_active.comment: If your all products are having same price or you want to set a global minimum and maximum price for all products then you can enable it otherwise disable it.You will also get product wise repricing in product edit section

jet_repricemin.label: Minimum Price
jet_repricemin.comment: Enter minimum price for all products.Leave Blank if you want to set minimum price product wise

jet_repricemax.label: Maximum Price
jet_repricemax.comment: Enter maximum price for all products.Leave Blank if you want to set maximum price product wise

jet_repricebid.label: Bidding Price
jet_repricebid.comment: Enter Bidding/Variation price for all products.Leave Blank if you want to set Bidding/Variation price product wise

jet_cronsize.label: Cron Chunk Size
jet_cronsize.comment: Select chunk size for cron jobs to sync product on jet.com

jet_product_auto_sync.label: Auto Sync With Jet
jet_product_auto_sync.comment: If product is disabled or deleted it auto archive the product on jet.com.

show_jetupload_on_productedit.label: Show Upload Button
show_jetupload_on_productedit.comment: Show product upload button to jet on product edit page.

jet_config_product_name.label: Send Configurable (Parent) Product's Name
jet_config_product_name.comment: Choose yes if you want to send parent product's name during configurable products upload

jet_config_product_price.label: Send Configurable (Parent) Product's Price
jet_config_product_price.comment: Choose yes if you want to send parent product's price (as same as display in magento frontend) during configurable products upload

jet_config_product_image.label: Send Configurable (Parent) Product's Image
jet_config_product_image.comment: Choose yes if you want to send parent product's image (as same as display in magento frontend) during configurable products upload

jet_config_product_desc.label: Send Configurable (Parent) Product's Description
jet_config_product_desc.comment: Choose yes if you want to send parent product's description (as same as display in magento frontend) during configurable products upload

jet_config_product_option.label: Archive Child Products
jet_config_product_option.comment: Choose whether child product need to be archieved on jet.com once it's parent config product is disabled or deleted

productinfo_map.label: Minimum Jet Attribute Mapping to List Mapping on Jet.com
productinfo_map.comment: Enter product attribute codes used for sending information on Jet

jet_product_price.label: Jet Product Price
jet_product_price.comment: Select to send different product price to jet.com

jpriceper.label: Enter Percentage
jpriceper.comment:
Numeric value Required for Add % on Magento price
5 for Example: Magento price + 5% of Magento price.
Off % on Magento price
5 for Example: 5% off on Magento price.

jpriceperdec.label: Enter Percentage
jpriceperdec.comment:
Numeric value Required for Add % on Magento price
5 for Example: Magento price + 5% of Magento price.
Off % on Magento price
5 for Example: 5% off on Magento price.

j_diff_pricep.label: Map Attribute
j_diff_pricep.comment: Attribute Code Required in case of Custom Fixed Price

jmultipack_quantity.label: Multipack Quantity
jmultipack_quantity.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric value: 1 to 128 (For Simple & Configural Products default value is 1)  
Number of items with the given Standard Product Code that makes up your merchant SKU (product offer).

identifiers.label: Identifier Mapping
identifiers.comment: Map Identifier with your magento attributes if already exist.

jmanufacturer_part_number.label: Manufacturer part number
jmanufacturer_part_number.comment:
Attribute type - Select or Text 
MPN must be within - 50 characters

jmanufacture.label: Manufacturer
jmanufacture.comment:
Attribute type - Select or Text 
Manufacturer information must be within - 100 characters

jbullets.label: Bullets
jbullets.comment:
Attribute type - Text 
Jet currently allow 5 bullets and limitations 100 characters.

jshipping_weight_pounds.label: Shipping Weight Pounds
jshipping_weight_pounds.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Map Shipping weight information with magento attribute. Value must be >= 0.01

jmap_price.label: Map Price
jmap_price.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Minimum Advertised Price (MAP) for the product. Set Minimum selling price for your product. Map attribute to set the minmimum advertise price. Price must be >=0.01 Read More

productextra_infomap.label: Jet Additional Attribute Mapping
productextra_infomap.comment: Enter product attribute codes used for sending information on Jet.

amazon_item_type_keyword.label: Amazon Item Type Keyword
amazon_item_type_keyword.comment:
Attribute type - Text 
ItemType allows customers to find your products as they browse to the most specific item types.

number_units_for_ppu.label: Number Units For Price Per Unit
number_units_for_ppu.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric  
For Price Per Unit calculations, the number of units included in the merchant SKU. The unit of measure must be specified in order to indicate what is being measured by the unit-count.

type_of_unit_for_ppu.label: Type of unit for price per unit
type_of_unit_for_ppu.comment:
Attribute type - Text 
The type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit attribute is a label for the number_units_for_price_per_unit. The price per unit can then be constructed by dividing the selling price by the number of units and appending the text "per unit value." For example, for a six-pack of soda, number_units_for_price_per_unit= 6, type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit= can, price per unit = price per can.

package_length_inches.label: Package Length Inches
package_length_inches.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Length of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration. Number >= 0.01

package_width_inches.label: Package Width Inches
package_width_inches.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Width of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration. Number >= 0.01

package_height_inches.label: Package height inches
package_height_inches.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Height of the merchant SKU when in its shippable configuration. Number >= 0.01

display_length_inches.label: Display Length Inches
display_length_inches.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Length of the merchant SKU when in its fully assembled/usable condition. Number >= 0.01

display_width_inches.label: Display width Inches
display_width_inches.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Width of the merchant SKU when in its fully assembled/usable condition. Number >= 0.01

display_height_inches.label: Display Height Inches
display_height_inches.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Height of the merchant SKU when in its fully assembled/usable condition- number >= 0.01

legal_disclaimer_description.label: Legal Disclaimer Description
legal_disclaimer_description.comment:
Attribute type - Text 
Any legal language required to be displayed with the product.

safety_warning.label: Safety Warning
safety_warning.comment:
Attribute type - Text 
If applicable, Send safety warnings with your product map attribute. - 2000 characters

country_of_origin.label: Country Of Origin
country_of_origin.comment:
Attribute type - Text or Select 
The country that the item was manufactured in - 50 characters

msrp.label: Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price
msrp.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
The manufacturer's suggested retail price or list price for the product. Value must be >= 0.01

fullfillment_time.label: Fulfillment Time
fullfillment_time.comment:
Attribute type - Numeric 
Number of business days from receipt of an order for the given merchant SKU until it will be shipped (only populate if it is different than your account default). 0 = ships the day the OrderMessage is received 1 = ships one business day after the 'merchant_order' is received 2= ships two business days after the 'merchant_order' is received N = ships N business days after the 'merchant_order' is received
